verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love You, my Savior. I love You, my King. Your excellent greatness And praises I sing. For Yours is the kingdom, The glory and power. Your glorious returning Will be any hour.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Look up your redemption draweth nigh Awake O my soul! The Son will come breaking through the clouds To call us all home.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love You, my Savior. I love You, my King. Your excellent greatness And praises I sing. For Yours is the kingdom, The glory and power. Your glorious returning Will be any hour.{/lang-eng}
